title: Escada logo typeface
content:
Is this custom, anyone?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [escada.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819132221/http:/typophile.com/files/escada.png) | 29.88 KB |
author: Toby

comments.content: looks like futura but the "S" is slightly off.

Except for the high-waisted A, it could be Metro aka Geometric 415 aka DH Sans:  
 [http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/geometric-415/alternate\_cuts.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819132221/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/geometric-415/alternate_cuts.html "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/geometric-415/alternate\_cuts.html")
Escada's logo is custom. Their corporate typeface for other items is Futura.
